com.cscguru.com.balance

Class Balance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.com.balance.Balance

  • public abstract class Balance
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for class balances.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float HP_RATIO_K
      Leveling ratio for HP for knights.

      static float PIERCE_REDUCT

      static float REDUCT_BASE
      Base armor value needed to achieve (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.
      static float REDUCT_RATIO
      This ratio gets multiplied by the player's level to determine how much armor the player needs for (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.

      • XP_RATIO

        public static final float XP_RATIO
        Ratio that determines how much experience the player needs to level up based on the previous level max experience. (eg. experience needs for level 2: 1000; experience needs for level 3: 1000*2.1)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REDUCT_RATIO

        public static final float REDUCT_RATIO
        This ratio gets multiplied by the player's level to determine how much armor the player needs for (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REDUCT_BASE

        public static final float REDUCT_BASE
        Base armor value needed to achieve (although impossible) 100% damage reduction.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PIERCE_REDUCT

        public static final float PIERCE_REDUCT
        This ratio gets multiplied by how many levels higher than the player the mob is. For every level, the player's armor reduction drops by .05%. This calculation can go into the negative to add damage done to the player.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final float HP_RATIO_K
